revised_title: Experimental Investigation of Vibration in Asymmetric Rotating Shafts
tldr: This article presents experimental and theoretical investigations of the speed-dependent sag and the first and second-order vibration of a flexible, axially asymmetric rotor. The authors designed a measuring device to directly measure the variations in the rotor's deflection and vibration, providing valuable information for understanding and improving the dynamic behavior of rotating shafts in industrial applications.
